body.content: From cut and fill to curb and sidewalk, Jones Contracting, Inc. has extensive experience providing heavy civil & site work for housing developments and commercial buildings. Our main goal is to offer comprehensive site work services to maximize efficiency and minimize your cost.  We have a team of subcontractors who share our emphasis on communication and work quality.  Our site work services include:

list.item: Water, Sewer, and Drain Mains and Laterals
Electric Telephone and Cable Conduit and Appurtenances
Road Gravel Installation and Fine Grading
Asphalt Binder, Top Course and Berm Paving
Standard or Sloped Concrete, Asphalt, and Granite Curbing
Asphalt and Concrete Sidewalks with ADA Handicap Ramps
